name: Kwagwagyak
description:
Move to next position, evading timed & repeating bombs.

Controls: Touch (or mouse), no drag.

This game was created during 2016.01-2016.02 when I have spare time and feels to do so.

Aim of this game was as below.

  • Bring famous genre "Bomb evasion(폭탄피하기)" on SCBW "use map settings" games created by other users.
  • finish some-volumed game. Can I do this?
    • Originally I wanted to create volumes to have 4 worlds x 4 levels; but result is 3 worlds x 4 levels.
    • The goal achieved as some sort.

korean h/p: http://plitri.net/games_kwagwagyak.html
